job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Position:&nbsp;Site Reliability EngineerLocation: Remote till Covid, Weehawken, NJType of job: Contract      JOB Description&nbsp;        - location: the initially remote post that Weehawken US once situation normalize.   
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Primary skills for a new&nbsp;SRE:&nbsp;  - Linux administration   
  - Bash shell scripting   
  - Experience with Azure or another cloud provider   
  - Docker and Kubernetes   
  - Experience with Application performance monitoring tools.   
  - Experience with any languages for querying log data – search processing language (Splunk), Kusto (Azure), Kibana query language (Elasticsearch)   
  - SQL   
  - Understanding of&nbsp;SRE&nbsp;concepts.   
  - Git   
&nbsp;&nbsp;Additional skills:  - Python   
  - Infrastructure as code (Terraform, Puppet, Chef or Ansible)   
  - DevOps build automation and CI/CD (Gerrit, Maven, Jenkins, Nexus, Artifactory, Selenium)   
&nbsp;         Thanks&nbsp;Ashwini4085569096ashwini@tsourceinc.net
